caption: The alchemist açaí bowl was delicious!

My first 3 day cleanse ever was delicious and I wasn’t as hungry as I thought I would be. I chose the seasonal cleanse. I loved the mint chocolate chip drink for desert and the love drink mid day. Lost 7lbs
Nick was super friendly and the smoothies were delicious!
good smoothie and good service. nick helped me out and did a nice job. by far my favorite local smoothie option.
Very healthy forward options, however it's a tad bit pricey.
The bowls are phenomenal and the staff is amazing.
The liquid love was amazing! The guy who took our order was super nice and highly recommend checking this place out. Also, coconut macaroons are phenomenal. Will definitely be back!

Just ordered a delicious made to order smoothie, “old world order” and it was really tasty and peanut buttery :) I asked them to package my smoothie with a bag of ice to keep it smoothie texture and they REALLY pulled through!!! Thank you guys so much

I did a three day juice cleanse with my sister. JuiceRx is amazing!  They have excellent customer service. The juice was delivered on time. And every juice I ordered on the custom cleanse was so, so delicious!  I highly recommend that you check them out.

I ordered the Harlequin Monkey on my first visit and let me tell you...WOW! It was so delicious, I am obsessing over it and can't wait to visit again as soon as possible.  I usually make my own smoothies, bowls and even juice at home, so it takes a lot to impress me! I love this place.  In fact, I decided to do my first juice cleanse through them! I added a picture of day 1 juices. They are delicious and filling. The customer service and communication has been stellar (we had it delivered). I highly recommend this place for healthy, delicious and nutritious food and juices.

I went with my family today to eat their acai bowl. we ordered the first option and ordered a large size for three adults. The portion size was perfect and I didnt feel guilty about eating dessert. It was refreshing with right amount of sweetness.

Visited the city and worked out at PF. Visited the establishment twice. First time was a great experience. Great Green smoothie, great customer service from two women employees. Second experience was unfortunately the complete opposite. Tall male employee was rude and the same smoothie lacked the same quality.
This place is great! Unreal staff. Great quality. Totally customizable.

I have been juicing on my own for years and let me tell you this place has the freshest, best tasting juice (even better than doing it myself)  And the customer service is impeccable - very nice and attentive people-give them a try!!  Shop Local!!  :-)

Great quality and selection of cold pressed juices. If you have ever juiced or attempted to juice you can fully understand all that it takes from the purchase of the organic ingredients to the cleanup. JuiceRx handles all of this for you! The staff and owners are curtious and very thorough. For anyone out there looking to improve thier health, body composition and well being I would highly recommend JuiceRx! Feels great to support a local small business !!
This place is real deal! Been searching for decades and finally found Juice Rx.
Healthy, fresh and great customer service!!!! Absolutely a gem! Dean and Val were just outstanding. Went out their way to let my wife and I try some of their products. Totally recommend this place.

Just tried JuiceRx yesterday and am so happy to have a place like this close by. Staff are so nice and helpful, I was able to find exactly what I wanted quickly! You guys are awesome! I’ll definitely be back.

I appreciate the ease of ordering and how quickly the bottles arrived at my door. The three day juice cleanse was just what I needed to reset my system after a trip. I will definitely be back for more!

Delicious and fresh food but geesh they are extremely SLOW with making orders. Even if you order ahead it takes them entirely to long to complete orders. Took 45 mins to receive an order I placed on the app.

The food is delicious, I’ll say that first! Prices=outrageous. Split the avocado toast with someone not knowing it’s literally one tiny piece of bread cut in half for $12. For this reason I won’t be returning often.

Cooper makes the best Rose and Chamomile tea with almond milk of course and touch of agave to sweeten it up a bit.  Ariana offers the best in customer service.  That is my 1 to 2 times a week treat to myself at the Ontario location!! Thanks guys, T.
So good and so pretty!

Today was my first time trying Juice RX. I must say I was skeptical because it’s not every day that plants taste good LOL. But I took a deep dive into My juice cleanse and I must say I am a fan for life! My faves so far our liquid Lipo, liquid gold, immunity, Radiance, and for a treat salted Caramell chocolate almond omg!! Do yourself a favor and grab one or multiple juices like me.Don’t look for the medical system to take care of your health change what you eat and change your health!! My energy has increased, mental clarity and no more migraines and now back pain is dissipating also. Thanks JuiceRX !

The perfect solution for me when I'm in rural IL without easy access to lots of quality produce. The juices are consistently good quality, tasty combinations and delivered to my door overnight. So happy I found them, great juice and great service.

Twice per year like clockwork, I do a juice cleanse. And every time I get the goods from JuiceRX. It's the best, best, highest quality, most delicious juice on the planet. Not exaggerating. One time I wasn't near the Streeterville store (and I work in the burbs), so I (literally) picked the juice up at their factory in the suburbs. I got to see the ladies cold pressing the juice--they were SO sweet and took so much pride in their work. They brought out free samples, new flavors to try...it was amazing. If there were a hundred stars I would award every single one. Three cheers for businesses like JuiceRx!
The most unique fusion of fruit and vegetables I have ever experienced. This is a taste you will never forget. Chicago is lucky to have this.
Great location and the vibes are just right. Delicious!
Awesome bowls. Super friendly/knowledgeable staff. Highly recco if you are looking for a good juice/smoothie/açaí bowl place !

JuiceRx is the best spot in Chicago! Not just for juice but also for raw food and snacks. JuiceRx uses high quality, organic ingredients. I never have to worry about the caliber of food I’m putting into my body from JuiceRx—a major plus for people who are health oriented. Their smoothies are better than any in the city. And all of their açaí bowls are well worth a try! The barista’s craft them with care and you can really taste the difference (top-notch ingredients help as well ;) This location also served intelligentsia coffee—and a full espresso bar with strictly vegan milk options! JuiceRx is heaven on earth.

Juice Rx is AMAZING. Not only are the juices all delicious, but the customer service is seriously above and beyond anything I’ve experienced. Dean and the Juice Rx team made sure I got exactly what I wanted when I needed it. You cannot go wrong with this place!

Their drinks are real and contain more than just cucumbers and celery!  The desserts are delicious and something your sweet tooth can feel good about! I have not tried their food yet but will! Get on over there ASAP!
Super fresh and exactly what I needed in the city.  Huge variety of choices of vegetarian, organic and healthy meals and snacks.   Had an amazing day after an awesome breakfast here!
The best Açaí bowls, kale chips, fresh organic juices. I have gone there two days in a row and brought home 9 açaí bowls eat day for my kids and I.
Went here for the first time craving a smoothie. I got the tropical green smoothie and it's so delicious!! I want more!!

Many great gluten free options i had the fruit alchemist bowl...very tasty. Macro Maca smoothie was excellent as well both with fresh fruit including goji berries made fresh just for me! Rounded out the order with kale chips coconut and original. Only had a couple of those because I'm full! But so far light and flavorful. A must try we"ll be back
Friendly and helpful staff! Enjoyed the great food, coffee, and immunity boost!

Such a wide variety of fresh, healthy & delicious menu items to choose from. I ordered the Banana Dragon açaí bowl (pictured), avocado toast & some kale chips + cold-pressed juices (for the road). Everything was garden fresh & palette pleasing! Super friendly/informative staff + clean environment as well. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Amazing food! The Harlequin bowl was delicious and fulfilling. Great customer service, and an enjoyable environment. I would definitely recommend to others and deserves another revisit.
Amazing juices with the best and most unique blend of ingredients.  Best Juice bar in the city!!!  A+++
Love this place, #1 Juice bar in the city

Really a big fan of JuiceRX, their delivery service is awesome and always accommodating.. even when I give them the wrong address - SORRY GUYS!  Amazing juice with high quality ingredients and you can taste the difference.  The winter root is my seasonal favorite.  I'll continue to work with them to get all my juices and shots!  Thanks!
Love Juice RX cleanses after a vacation away to get back on track! everything is so good and even when not doing cleanses I stop in the store just to get a few juices for the week
(Translated by Google) Wonderful place, all delicious and of such quality. The personnel is very friendly.  (Original) Lugar maravilloso, todo delicioso y de tan calidad. El personal es muy amable.

OMG, I think I’ve fallen in love. In town visiting family and fell upon this gem! Everything inside is organic, so many vegan options! I had the green magnolia smoothie which was beyond delish, along with a few juices and 2 packages of kale chips. I have been drinking the anti-inflammatory juice and fee the difference. The staff were exceptional. I will be back again next time I’m in town! I spoke to the owner on the phone and set up delivery of juices and chips to my house in MI. Definitely a highlight of my Chicago trip!

This place is bomb. Everything is organic, fresh, and dairy free which is great for me. The Old World Order smoothie is so good!!! It tastes like peanut butter and jelly! I sampled the macro maca which was amazing too. The winter nog (egg nog) smoothie was delicious and the peanut butter latte was so smooth. You can add shots to your drinks too—elderberry, bee pollen, the options are endless! Great quality products that also taste great, you can’t beat it! I will definitely be back :D

I stopped in to JuiceRx for a smoothie and didnt realize the variety of other tasty products offered! Loved their vegan eggnog called Winter Nog along with the Kale chips which I cant get enough of..  this place has become a go to for me and I look forward to stopping in again soon for a juice or one of their bowls. Oh, and their kale chips are a must try as well. Those Umami...
Best acai bowl anywhere. Juices are crisp. People are +++

I’ve been a loyal JuiceRx customer for years! It’s nice to know everything you get is made with the highest quality ingredients available. In a world full of “Franken-food”, JuiceRx is a beacon of hope! Their newest location now offers coffee and espresso which means I can get everything I need to start my day in one place :) Definitely worth checking out!
Great company...had a problem with delivery and they bent over backwards to get the missing items to me. Everything was fresh and tasted wonderful.

I was on the hunt for some good organic green juice as a quick breakfast-on-the-go option, since I have a very busy schedule as a graduate student. Most green juices that I found in Chicago aren't organic, and the few that are often have too much sugar. Supermarket options are often pasteurized. That is why I was very happy to find the Supreme Green juice from Juicerx- it has the highest concentration of greens that I have found to date. I like that the taste is not too sweet and it didn't give me a hypoglycemic effect that other juices often do. I'm a bit OCD about nutrition, esp the amount of sugar and sodium I am consuming, however a lot of juice bars do not provide these kinds of information. So I was very happy to see that every Juicerx bottle has detailed nutritional information on them  On top of that, the customer service is incredible. They happily helped me set up weekly delivery, and when an item is out, the owner himself would contact me to apologize and offer replacement. I cannot recommend this place high enough.
The peanut butter chai is absolutely amazing!

New location but our first time at either. This place was a really nice surprise find. The Acai bowls were large and delicious and the espresso was excellent. The guy working the counter was positive and obviously hard working. In general a really nice pleasant surprise.
SO YUMMY. This place is such a good find. Delicious Açaí bowl—would recommend the “fruit alchemist”!

Literally what I look forward to every day. The bowls and smoothies are always beautifully crafted and delicious! Dino, the manager, always ensures the highest level of customer service and keeps the store looking flawless. The harlequin monkey bowl is my favorite!
First time in great experience, convenient location near OTF and other studios. Friendly helpful staff and great options - loved the supreme green ($12). Prices are on par with quality juice in town.

OMG ! I never thought I had a place like this in my neighborhood!!! I walked in afew days ago and fell in love with the setting and juices. I had great customer service. Dino was really helpful and friendly, it became one of my favorite places to bring my friends in!!
What a pleasant experience! I haven’t been here before and Dino was so amazing and taking his time to properly explain the menu and different options. Dino was a total sweetheart!

I have tried several different juice companies and I LOVE JuiceRX - the juices taste great and the variety is fantastic.  They make it easy to do a custom cleanse and it's a great re-boot for my system.  There was an issue with my delivery and the team went out of their way to resolve it.  Highly recommend JuiceRX!!

Wow! The customer service at Juice Rx is amazing---truly over the top! When I had a misunderstanding about the timing of my delivery, Dean bent over backwards, without any prompting on my part, to get me my order when I was expecting it. I was extremely impressed, and the juices are great--organic, fresh, and tasty. Thank you!!

Completely obsessed with this place!  The staff is so knowledgeable and friendly.  I'm pretty sure I'm gonna need a "Newton" juice daily so this won't be the last time you will see me. Thank you guys for serving our community so well!

This company is amazing! Dean, the owner is always on top of things. I recommend this place to everyone. I have done 2 cleanses with them and am about to order my 3rd. They are high quality, good tasting juice. First cleanse I've Ever done that I look forward to the next juice!

Excellent customer service "beyond business as usual" both Dean and store staff. Willing to make drinks honoring an almond allergy. Cleansing drinks taste good; deliveries extremely reliable with contact when order will be dropped off. They call you when they are behind schedule. Absolutely accommodating and will do whatever it takes to make customer happy!

Excellent customer service! I have been ordering juice cleanses from Juice Rx for a couple of years. I live in AZ. They always arrive as scheduled and cold regardless of the outside temperatures (100+). I have tried local juice places and always come back to Juice Rx as they offer a superior product. I just ordered another cleanse (my 10th) and asked if they could make some of my old favorites that are not on their current menu. Dean called to let me know that as long as they once made it, they could make again, all I had to do was ask. WOW! That's excellent customer service!
The service is excellent.  The juices and shots taste great.  I highly recommend.
juice coconut tastes pretty good. price was bit surprising
They make amazing gourmet raw food and super nourishing juice I ordered online! Super convienient and friendly! :)

Great product, great service!  Started with a 3 day cleanse since I'd never done one and it was easy and the variety was great.  A great way to get your fruits and veggies!  Nut milks are awesome and filling!  Happy to hear mint chocolate chip is coming back!

Love the juices I've ordered from JuiceRx.  I've been drinking them for the last few years.  The cleanse is great but, I love the fact that I can run into the store and pick up some of my favorite flavors to have during the day.  So excited for the new store to open up soon.
I've done 3 times extreme green juice cleanses. Really fresh juices, and good taste. Also kale chips are good, too!

The juices are absolutely amazing!!! I've done quite a few cleanses with JuiceRx, and the juices are delicious, fresh and best of all....actually taste like yummy veggies and fruit; not watered-down-sugary-something-or-other. There's always a new flavor to try, they take fabulous pride in offering super products and you just feel ridiculously good after drinking one or MORE. I've tried the food a couple times too and also unbelievably good for the body and the taste palate. Yum, yum!

Love, Love, Love this place.  Have yet to visit the store but have had the multi-day cleanses delivered on a number of occasions.  Juices and nut milks are Waaaay tastier than when I juice at home, everything is super fresh, and as importantly, the JuiceRx folks are super friendly and helpful!

I did the Extreme cleanse for 2 days. I really like that it is a low sugar cleanse. It was fresh, tasty and filling. The flavors were unique and had a nice mix of fruit, greens and herbs. My favorites were the Coconut Milk, Green Glow, Green Radiance and Mate Magic. The Coconut Milk is creamy, delicious and comforting. You won't be craving a dessert during the cleanse :) Customer service is excellent. Dean and Johnny were friendly, helpful and delivered my cleanse to my door the same day I ordered. I'm looking forward to doing a lengthier cleanse. So glad JuiceRx is in Chicago and close to my neighborhood.
Best juice bar in town by far. Great food too!

I've drank other natural juice drinks but nothing like this the purest most natural  drink you can get on the market hands down it's a new start up and I totally recommend you trying it out your health will thank you
Gotta try the Salted caramel chocolate almond shake! Raw healthy tasty exotic ingredients! Feel great after!

I am crazy about the milks they sell! Ive tried them all, and they are absolutely delicious.  As for the desserts, the peanut butter raw cheesecake is unbelievable. I've done 3 juice cleanses so far and will continue to do more. The nut milks and amazing juice flavors make the detox more manageable and I look forward to opening the next bottle.

I can't say enough great things about how DELICIOUS the food and drinks are here!  The nut milks taste like the most decadent milkshake ever.  My favorite is the Horchata.  And the Kale chips are more addictive than pringles.  I started ordering raw juices from JuiceRX years ago and it has made a huge difference in my health and also my weight.  I love their store front because I can stop in any time I'm craving something tasty and healthy.  Why can't all food places be this healthy and taste this good!? Hey JuiceRX!  Can you please open a healthy fast food drive-through location?  It would be revolutionary!
Best juices and raw food by far!  Love the large selection and many offerings. This has become my go-to for breakfast, love the raw oatmeal!!!

I went into the store this past weekend and had a wonderful experience. Frank was very helpful in answering any questions that I had. He allowed me to sample a few drinks, as well as the seaweed chips(?). It is rather far from my house but I will make it a point to have some things delivered or take a little trip 😊. I was very pleased with my first visit.

What a fantastic experience! I highly recommend the Seasonal Cleanse to any first timer. My physician at Northwestern recommended that I juice after having a bad reaction to a medication. I figured if an MD was recommending it, it couldn't be totally crazy. Right off the bat, I was impressed by the customer service of the company. I was able to customize my cleanse a bit (there were quite a few flavors I wanted to try, and Dean was kind enough to substitute them into my cleanse). During the cleanse, I felt much better than anticipated. Were food commercials difficult? Yes. But I wasn't terribly hungry. In fact, I found I only needed about 4 of the 6 daily juices. And let's talk about the juices themselves. Way better than anything I've ever made in my juicer. The Watermelon Mint (with lime and sea salt) was absolutely amazing. I could drink that every day. The Evening Green was the best green juice I have ever tried.
